General.Name: Gudang Garam Tbk
General.Description: PT Gudang Garam Tbk produces and sells cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Cigarettes, Paperboards, and Others segments. It offers hand-rolled, machine-made, and klobot clove cigarettes. The company markets its products under the Gudang Garam Family, Surya Family, GG Family, and other brand names. It is also involved in trading activities; and provision of safety protective equipment, and investment and construction services. In addition, the company provides tobacco processing, non-scheduled air transportation, and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as PT Perusahaan Rokok Tjap "Gudang Garam" Kediri. PT Gudang Garam Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Kediri, Indonesia. PT Gudang Garam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Suryaduta Investama.
